main.name: Shashwat Yadav
main.description: Let's collaborate to create disruptive products together
main.bio: I am a New Delhi based product manager. I completed my B.Tech from Indian Institute of Technology Delhi and have worked in a wide range of domains such as financial services, politics, automotive and education. I truly believe in potential of innovation to favorably impact peoples’ lives; therefore, I enjoy creating tech-based products which can engender sustainable impact.
main.bio1: I am a New Delhi based product manager. I completed my B.Tech from Indian Institute of Technology Delhi and have worked in a wide range of domains such as financial services, politics, automotive and education. I truly believe in potential of innovation to favorably impact peoples’ lives; therefore, I enjoy creating tech-based products which can engender sustainable impact.
main.bio2: Throughout my career, not only have I pursued opportunities which can satisfy my passion but also sought creative tech-enabled ways to solve complex/ambiguous business-problems. Be it at Fractal (for Visa) where I created products to micro-target potential travelers or be it while I was consulting Prime Minister Modi for his 2014 general election campaign. At ClickGarage, a start-up I Co-founded, and which was later acquired by CarCrew Technologies, I conceptualized a cloud-based tool to manage partner workshops. The tool offerings multi-billion-dollar clients such as Uber and brought standardization to a highly fragmented after-sale automotive industry.
main.bio3: I am interested in collaborating with like-minded futurists to conceptualize and create disruptive products.

education.description: Patent (#App : 1809/DEL/2013): Ideated and designed an innovative capillary flow (within textiles) testing device for thesis; Awarded 100% funding by Department of Science and Technology (DST), Government of India; Rights of the patent later sold to a Ahmedabad based private lab for further development

work.title: Chief Product Officer
work.companyDescription: CareerAnna is India’s largest vernacular e-learning platform helping its users outperform in their respective competitive examination

description_list.description: Leading a team of developers, designers and testers to manage the product dev process from conception through design, build, release, analysis & iteration making products providing users an interactive learning experience
Created an adaptive test engine that analyses user performance and creates a custom study plan and content

Redesigned the learning management system, product flow, navigational logic & streamlined the user experience across the platform, increasing the course completion rate from 42% to 64% in a span of 6 months

work.title: Co-Founder and CEO
work.companyDescription: ClickGarage is a dealer owned workshop network to provide affordable, transparent & convenient automobile services

description_list.description: Built and led a team of 30+ employees who catered 16k+ customers, generating revenue of over $1.5M

Created first of its kind integrated workshop management system for partner workshops; Software is in use by 300+ workshops and led to an estimated aggregate net promoter score increment from 8 to 54 (575% Increase)
Cultivated partnerships with 300+ workshops, suppliers such as Mobil1, Shell & businesses such as Uber, Ola
Negotiated acquisition of the company in a cash & stock deal for its superior tech. and partner relationships

work.title: External Consultant
work.companyDescription: Consulted Mr. Ahmed Patel, member of parliament and chief architect of Congress’ parliamentary election victory in 2004 and 2009

description_list.description: Ideated and executed various products to implement the outreach strategy for 2017 Gujarat assembly election
Selected and led 400+ volunteers across 40K+ booths to effectively utilize voter targeting products/strategies
Achieved over 15% vote share increment in 60 out of 91 targeted constituencies

work.title: Project Lead
work.companyDescription: Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s ¬(BJP) campaign management team in 2014; he won largest majority in 30 years with 170M+ votes

description_list.description: As a team, introduced various tech-products for analytics-driven election campaigning; Saved ~20% of campaign resources (~$23M+) by segmenting ~600K booths based on propensity to vote for BJP and optimizing outreach operations

Hired and led a team of 13 analysts/developers for product development on poll booth analysis, sentiment analysis and opinion polling; Replaced 100-member vendor team saving $1M and reducing turn-around time by 4 months

Conceptualized and led the tech-implementation of various mass voter outreach campaigns such as “Chai pe Charcha” (3M+ voters), “3D Hologram rallies” (7.5M+ voters) and “Run for Unity” (5M+ voters, Guinness world record)

work.title: Analyst/Senior Analyst Consultant
work.companyDescription: Fractal is a strategic partner to many Fortune 500 companies and helps them take strategic decision based on data analytics

description_list.description: Developed models for Farmers, a leading US based Insurance firm, to predict defaults which were pitched and sold to the client; due to self-driven initiatives, selected among 100+ analysts to represent Fractal at Visa office in Dubai

Spearheaded various projects for key client Visa such as analysing cross-border business opportunities, developing business cases for potential partnerships, achieving a perfect Net Promoter Score of 100

testimonials.text: Shashwat, a person full of passion and dedication towards his work. He was a key pillar of the team and had totally impressed the client with his initiatives. He has always gone an extra mile to get the work done. A sure recruit and a key Team member. All the best!!

Given our professional association, I have had the opportunity to monitor shashwat's career progression. As a remarkably astute and committed professional, Shashwat has consistently delivered high-quality work, met and/or exceeded his deadline and performance expectations, and assisted my other colleagues at every available opportunity.
